title: Ensure CMF earbuds appears in Home featured products when published

requirements.summary: Make Home featured products reliably include the published "cmf-earbuds" product when it exists, so it is visible on public storefront surfaces without manual admin republishing.
acceptanceCriteria: When the public product list includes a published product with id "cmf-earbuds", the Home page featured products section renders it within the featured grid (top 4).
When "cmf-earbuds" is absent from the public product list, the Home page featured products section behavior remains unchanged (still shows up to 4 products).
The Shop page and Category pages continue to render products based solely on the public product queries without requiring any admin interaction.

file_operations.description: Update featured product selection logic to prioritize including the product with id "cmf-earbuds" (when present in the published products list) within the first 4 featured products, while preserving existing loading/initializeShop behavior and overall layout.
